price: គឺជាថ្ងៃដែលឧបាយកលរបស់ពួកគេមិនអាចការពារអ្វីដល់ ពួកគេបានឡើយ ហើយពួកគេក៏គ្មានអ្នកជួយដែរ។
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yugh'nī ʿanhum kayduhum shayan walā hum yunṣarūna
